item.title: 康菲石油公司与德国 Uniper 公司达成天然气供应协议
item.description: 康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）将在未来 10 年为德国公用事业公司 Uniper SE 供应天然气，从而巩固这种燃料在欧洲仍然发挥的关键作用。【原文：ConocoPhillips is set to supply German utility Uniper SE with natural gas for the next 10 years, underpinning a key role the fuel still plays in Europe.】

item.title: 迈阿密投资钱柜777娱乐手机官网公司称前 IT 主管窃取贷款人欺诈诉讼数据
item.description: 迈阿密投资公司 777 Partners 正面临债权人的数起诉讼，该公司以自己的诉讼进行反击，指控一家主要贷款人雇用 777 的前信息技术主管为其诉讼窃取数据。【原文：Miami investment firm 777 Partners, which is facing several lawsuits by creditors, hit back with its own suit accusing one key lender of hiring 777’s former information technology head to steal data for its litigation.】

item.title: Loop 在东北部地区聘用前巴克莱银行和拉米雷兹公共银行家
item.description: 在今年市政债券销售反弹的背景下，这家总部位于芝加哥的投资银行在东北部扩展业务。【原文：Loop Capital Markets has hired three public finance bankers as the Chicago-based investment bank expands in the Northeast amid a rebound in municipal-bond sales this year.】

item.title: 美联储鸽派投降引发 ETF 新一轮上涨
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）本周发表鸽派言论后，ETF 大获全胜：充满利率风险的公司债、住宅建筑商和地区性银行。【原文：Among the big ETF winners after Jerome Powell’s dovish bonanza this week: Corporate debt teeming with interest-rate risk, homebuilders and regional banks.】

item.title: 特百惠公司破产纠纷推迟支付上门服务工人的工资
item.description: 特百惠进入破产法庭的第一天就遇到了麻烦，这家拥有 78 年历史的公司因与贷款人发生争执，被迫推迟向 46.5 万名上门承包商付款。【原文：Tupperware’s first day in bankruptcy court hit a sour note as the 78-year-old company that’s synonymous with storing leftovers was forced to delay paying 465,000 door-to-door contractors because of a spat with lenders.】

item.title: 持股 7.7% 的 Grifols 投资集团寻求董事会席位
item.description: 包括 Flat Footed LLC、Mason Capital Management LLC 和 Sachem Head Capital Management LP 在内的一批 Grifols SA 投资者正在寻求在这家西班牙制药商的董事会中占有一席之地。【原文：A group of Grifols SA investors including Flat Footed LLC, Mason Capital Management LLC and Sachem Head Capital Management LP is seeking a seat on the Spanish drugmaker’s board.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司告诉巴西最高法院它选择了法律代表
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司告诉巴西最高法院，该公司已任命两名律师在巴西担任其代表，此前近三周，一名高级法官下令互联网提供商在拉丁美洲最大的国家禁止访问该社交媒体平台。【原文：Elon Musk’s X told Brazil’s Supreme Court that it had appointed two attorneys to represent it in the country, nearly three weeks after a top judge ordered internet providers to block access to the social media platform in Latin America’s largest nation.】

item.title: 凯雷的托马斯称 4.5% 的美联储利率将成为 "新常态
item.description: 卡莱尔集团的杰森-托马斯（Jason Thomas）敦促投资者做好准备，应对可能再次出现的通胀，因为通胀会迫使美联储官员将利率维持在 4.5% 左右。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s Jason Thomas is urging investors to prepare themselves for a potential resurgence of inflation that forces Federal Reserve officials to coalesce around an interest rate of 4.5%.】

item.title: 麦格理部门以 7,980 万美元与证交会欺诈指控达成和解
item.description: 麦格理投资管理商业信托公司同意就美国证券交易委员会对该公司夸大数千种非流动性投资价值和夸大客户账户业绩的指控达成和解。【原文：Macquarie Investment Management Business Trust agreed to settle allegations by the Securities and Exchange Commission that the company inflated the value of thousands of illiquid investments and overstated the performance of client accounts.】

item.title: 美国锂项目通过环境审查，Ioneer 公司业绩大增
item.description: 在美国公布了对该公司位于内华达州的锂矿项目有利的环境影响报告后，Ioneer Ltd. 的股价大涨。【原文：Ioneer Ltd. shares jumped after the US published a favorable environmental impact statement on the company’s lithium project in Nevada.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 有担保债权人集团可能面临分裂
item.description: 为 Altice 法国公司有担保债权人提供咨询的律师事务所发出的一封信使该集团的团结面临考验，使其成员有可能分头单独与该公司谈判。【原文：A letter sent by the law firm advising Altice France’s secured creditors is putting the group’s unity to the test, raising the prospect of its members splitting to negotiate with the company on their own.】

item.title: 美国炼油厂计划进行 2021 年以来最低的秋季维护
item.description: 美国燃料生产商正准备进行三年来最轻微的预防性维护，其大部分产能将保持在线的前景缓解了一些人对石油供应倒退的担忧。【原文：US fuelmakers are getting ready to carry out the lightest preventive maintenance season in three years, and the prospect that much of their capacity will stay online is easing some concerns about oil supplies backing up.】

item.title: 私人信贷正受到一系列风险的威胁
item.description: 由于利率上调使浮动利率债务对投资者更具吸引力，私人信贷规模从 2019 年开始翻了一番多。现在，美联储的降息又给这一价值 1.7 万亿美元的行业的飞速发展增加了阻力。【原文：Private credit more than doubled in size from 2019 thanks to interest rate hikes that made its floating-rate debt more attractive to investors. Now, a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut is adding to the headwinds hampering the breakneck growth of the $1.7 trillion industry.】

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩承诺为洪灾提供 100 亿欧元援助
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）承诺筹集高达 100 亿欧元（110 亿美元）的资金，帮助中欧领导人应对数十年来最严重的洪灾。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen promised to mobilize up to €10 billion ($11 billion) in funding to help central European leaders grappling with the worst flooding in decades.】

item.title: 罗杰-弗格森和日本 SBI 同意投资迪拜公司 Gateway Partners
item.description: 日本金融集团 SBI 控股公司和前美联储官员 Roger Ferguson 同意收购 Gateway Partners 集团的少数股权，这是迪拜最新一家吸引海外关注的金融公司。【原文：Japanese financial conglomerate SBI Holdings Inc. and former Federal Reserve official Roger Ferguson agreed to buy minority stakes in Gateway Partners Group, the latest Dubai financial firm to attract overseas interest.】

item.title: 传呼机爆炸事件中的黎巴嫩民兵真主党简介
item.description: 自哈马斯于10月7日与以色列发动新一轮战争以来，黎巴嫩民兵真主党一直通过军事行动声援这个伊斯兰巴勒斯坦组织。真主党几乎每天都向以色列北部发射导弹、迫击炮弹、火箭弹和爆炸性无人机，促使以色列以牙还牙。9月17日和18日，黎巴嫩境内有26人因寻呼机和对讲机（黎巴嫩人使用的老式小工具）爆炸而丧生。【原文：Since Hamas launched a new war with Israel on Oct. 7, the Lebanese militia Hezbollah has expressed solidarity with the Islamist Palestinian group through military action. It has fired missiles, mortars, rockets and explosive drones into northern Israel almost daily, prompting Israel to respond with its own fire. Fears that the fighting would escalate to full-scale war escalated after 26 people in Lebanon were killed on Sept. 17 and 18 when pagers and walkie-talkies, old-fashioned gadgets used by】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计到 2025 年底捷克语将下调 150 个基点
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，捷克决策者可能会继续实施宽松货币政策，并在明年年底前将关键利率累计下调 1.5 个百分点至 3%。【原文：Czech policymakers are likely to continue with monetary easing and lower the key interest rate by a cumulative 1.5 percentage points to 3% by the end of next year, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 随着旅行人数激增，拥挤的机场助长了公共汽车借贷热潮
item.description: 大量旅客涌入美国机场，掀起了疯狂的借贷热潮，为扩建项目筹集资金。【原文：An influx of travelers passing through US airports has created a frenzied borrowing boom to raise cash for expansion projects.】

item.title: 喀麦隆大坝泄洪威胁洪灾重灾区尼日利亚
item.description: 尼日利亚的洪灾已造成至少 269 人丧生，50 多万人流离失所，随着邻国喀麦隆从其一个主要水坝放水，洪灾似乎将变得更加严重。【原文：Flooding in Nigeria that has claimed the lives of at least 269 people and displaced more than 500,000 others looks set to get even worse as neighboring Cameroon releases water from one of its main dams.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率进一步下降，激发住房市场乐观情绪
item.description: 抵押贷款利率继续下降，达到 2023 年 2 月初以来的最低水平。【原文：Mortgage rates continued their decline, hitting the lowest level since early February 2023.】

item.title: 世界报》称马克龙将与巴尼耶会面讨论法国内阁问题
item.description: 据《世界报》报道，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）将于周四晚上 7:15 左右在巴黎与总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）会面，讨论新内阁的任命事宜。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron is set to meet with Prime Minister Michel Barnier around 7:15 p.m. in Paris on Thursday to discuss the appointment of a new cabinet, according to Le Monde newspaper.】

item.title: 去年预测反弹的策略师认为 S&P 指数将飙升至 6100 点
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场（BMO Capital Markets）称，股市的狂飙让今年的 S&P 500 指数飞涨了 20%，但这还远未结束。【原文：The stock market’s furious run that has sent the S&P 500 Index flying 20% this year is far from over, according to BMO Capital Markets.】

item.title: 大空头 "投资者撤销对特朗普获胜的预测，称大选胜负难料
item.description: Neuberger Berman 公司高级投资组合经理史蒂夫-艾斯曼（Steve Eisman）表示，他 "不知道 "谁将赢得美国总统大选；他推翻了早些时候关于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将获胜的预测；但他表示，除了民主党大获全胜之外，市场在任何情况下都不会有问题。【原文：Neuberger Berman senior portfolio manager Steve Eisman said he has “no idea” who will win the US presidential election — reversing an earlier prediction that Donald Trump would triumph — but said the markets will be fine in any scenario apart from a sweep by Democrats.】

item.title: 英特尔表示不会剥离大部分股权后 Mobileye 大涨
item.description: 在英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）表示 "目前 "不准备出售其在自动驾驶技术制造商 Mobileye Global Inc.【原文：Mobileye Global Inc. shares surged the most in nearly two years after Intel Corp. said it isn’t “currently” preparing to unload its majority stake in the maker of autonomous driving technology, easing investors’ fears.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉支持的 Wefox 任命首席执行官以结束股东之争
item.description: Wefox Holding AG 任命前安联保险公司经理约阿希姆-穆勒（Joachim Müller）为首席执行官，结束了这一保险科技初创公司创始人与部分股东之间的董事会争斗。【原文：Wefox Holding AG appointed former Allianz manager Joachim Müller as chief executive officer, ending a boardroom battle that pit the insurance tech startup’s founders against some of its shareholders.】

item.title: 宣布结束与好市多的合作关系后，Sunrun 业绩下滑
item.description: 住宅太阳能供应商Sunrun Inc.周三晚些时候表示，由于未能达成双方都同意的条款，该公司将终止与好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale Corp）的销售合作关系，之后该公司股价下跌达3.4%。【原文：Sunrun Inc. shares fell as much as 3.4% after the residential solar provider said late Wednesday it was ending its sales partnership with Costco Wholesale Corp. after the companies failed to reach mutually agreeable terms.】

item.title: 印度 IIFL 称监管机构取消黄金贷款业务禁令
item.description: 印度储备银行在周四提交给交易所的一份文件中表示，印度储备银行取消了对 IIFL Finance Ltd. 黄金贷款业务的限制，立即生效。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India lifted its restrictions on IIFL Finance Ltd.’s gold loan business, effective immediately, the Indian shadow lender said in a filing with exchanges Thursday.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚称北约必须击落俄罗斯的流浪无人机
item.description: 拉脱维亚总统表示，北约需要具备击落误入成员国领土的俄罗斯无人机的能力，同时他呼吁加强北约东翼的防空能力。【原文：Latvia’s president said NATO needs to have the ability to shoot down Russian drones that stray into member states’ territory as he called for increased air defenses on the alliance’s eastern flank.】

item.title: 欧盟在 Illumina 上的失败引发荷兰呼吁赋予其更多交易权力
item.description: 荷兰竞争监督机构正在寻求加强权力，以调查更多的小型交易，这些交易可能会破坏新兴科技市场的竞争，因为欧盟试图对这些交易进行审查的努力遭到了欧盟最高法院的否决。【原文：The Dutch competition watchdog is seeking beefed-up powers to probe more small deals that risk crushing competition in fledgling tech markets after the European Union’s attempts to vet them was shot down by the bloc’s top court.】
